Introduction

Kang Jung Woo, better known as Attack was a South Korean bassist and former member of the rock band TRAXX under SM Entertainment.

He made his first television appearance in 2002 on the survival show "2002 Survival Audition, HeeJun VS. KangTa; Battle of The Century" and later featured alongside TRAXX on BoA's song "Rock With You" in December 2003.

Shortly after the band released their fifth Japanese single "Cold Rain", Attack had decided to part ways with TRAXX.
